name: The Forest (itch) (JordynBryan)
description:
The forest is a side-scrolling platformer game where you fight enemies and avoid obstacles.  You play as an adventurer who lost his way in an unusual forest. The trees tower over you and music gives you a false sense of peace. The longer you play, the more sinister the forest becomes. Try to make it out alive!

Press start to play! 

Use 'W' to jump, 'A' to move left, and 'D' to move right. Press 'I' to call the inventory and 'E' to consume the item in the first slot. Click the mouse to shoot arrows.

Press P to pause the game at any point!
